i.name: Serpentine Grace
i.description: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

q.name: Noxious Blast
q.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

w.name: Miasma
w.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.

e.name: Twin Fang
e.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.

r.name: Petrifying Gaze
r.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

i1.blurb: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Cassiopeia''' cannot purchase [[boots]], but instead gains {{pp|4 to 72|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''base''' movement speed}}}}, for a total of {{pp|4+{{Data Cassiopeia|pst2|ms}} to 72+{{Data Cassiopeia|pst2|ms}}|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}}.
i1.name: Serpentine Grace
notes: * ''Serpentine Grace'' disables boots within the store but does not prevent '''Cassiopeia''' from purchasing other movement speed items.
* The movement speed from ''Serpentine Grace'' is worth {{g|48}} per level, up to a maximum of {{g|864}} at level 18.
* As {{ri|Predator}} and {{ri|Magical Footwear}} require boots, they will be replaced with {{ri|Electrocute}} and {{ri|Perfect Timing}}, respectively.

riot.name: Serpentine Grace
riot.description: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

riot.name: Noxious Blast
riot.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
riot.tooltip:
Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison. If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed decaying over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Noxious Poison deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds.

q1.blurb: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.4}}-second delay, '''Cassiopeia''' blasts the target area with {{tip|poison|Noxious Poison}}, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} every second for 3 seconds to all enemies it hits.
'''Cassiopeia''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 3 seconds if ''Noxious Blast'' hits an enemy champion.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|75 to 215}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Damage Per Second|{{ap|75/3 to 215/3}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
q1.name: Noxious Blast

riot.name: Miasma
riot.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
riot.tooltip:
Cassiopeia spews venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies in the clouds are continually afflicted with Debilitating Poison, inflicting a decaying {{ e2 }}% slow and grounding them, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. They also take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second.

Miasma has a minimum cast range.

w1.blurb: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cassiopeia''' spits forth eight bolts of venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds of {{tip|poison|Debilitating Poison}} where they hit the ground for 5 seconds. ''Miasma'' has a {{tt|minimum cast range|500 range}}.

{{tip|poison|Debilitating Poison}} deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies standing upon it every second, also {{tip|ground|grounding}} them and applying a {{tip|slow}} that decays over the area's duration.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Second|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|20*5 to 40*5}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}{{st|Slow|{{ap|40|50|60|70|80%}}}}
w1.name: Miasma

riot.name: Twin Fang
riot.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
riot.tooltip:
Deal {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to a target. If the target is killed by Twin Fang, or is killed during its flight, Cassiopeia gains {{ cost }} Mana.

If the victim is Poisoned when Twin Fang hits, it takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and Cassiopeia heals for {{ f4 }} (+{{ f2 }}).

e1.blurb: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cassiopeia''' launches her fangs at the target enemy, dealing {{pp|52 to 120|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}}. If ''Twin Fang'' kills its target, or the target is killed mid-flight, ''Twin Fang'' refunds {{as|its {{sti|mana}} cost}}.
If the target is {{tip|poison|poisoned}}, ''Twin Fang'' deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|heals}} '''Cassiopeia''' for {{sti|health|{{pp|5 to 22|color=health}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}}}.
e1.name: Twin Fang
notes: * ''Twin Fang's'' bonus damage and healing will also trigger on the following {{tip|poison|poisons}}.
* Apply {{tip|Single target}} effect to enemy target and {{tip|Heal}} to {{ci|Cassiopeia}}.

riot.name: Petrifying Gaze
riot.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
riot.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her turn to stone and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

r1.blurb: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a brief delay, '''Cassiopeia''' blasts enemies in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit.

Enemies facing '''Cassiopeia''' are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for 2 seconds upon being hit by ''Petrifying Gaze'', and all other affected enemies are instead {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 40% for the same duration.
r1.name: Petrifying Gaze
notes: * The facing direction of champions whose abilities/animations cause them to spin is always the direction they are moving in. In the event of abilities that cause the champion to spin on the spot ({{ai|Death Lotus|Katarina}}) it will factor the direction they were facing on cast.
* {{ci|Lucian}}, {{ci|Garen}} and {{ci|Wukong}} are facing in the direction of their movement when they are using {{ai|The Culling|Lucian}}, {{ai|Judgment|Garen}} and {{ai|Cyclone|Wukong}}.
